name: Comfy & Private Room w/ Airbed by the Red Line!
neighborhood_overview: It is a diverse neighborhood (Blacks, Whites, Hispanics and Cape Verdians).
description:
This apartment is centrally located between 2 major streets, Dorchester Ave & Columbia Rd, easy access to the Red Line Train going straight to Alewife (from Fields Corner station) and the Puple Line Commuter Train Station going straight to South Station (from Geneva Ave) & The Walgreens near by. Can access the bus as well to Fields Corner.
Laundromat, Cleaners, American Food Basket, Market Shops, Gas Sta by Fields Corner T-stop.

The space
The Private Bedroom also comes with a "Comfortable Airbed", Computer Desk & Chair and has 2 closets.

Guest access
Sharing All common areas with other students/professionals.

Other things to note
1) Please state your "Full Name" and the "Purpose of your Stay" when making your inquiry.
2) Area is safe
3) There is also "Free Street Parking" 24 hours, No Resident Permit required.
NO Parking (between 12 pm-4 pm) on Street Cleaning Day, on the 3rd Wednesday and Thurs
